EditText.android:text: GOAL: The goal of your warm-up is to prepare your muscles by increasing your body temperature. At the end, it is usually helpful to do some light stretching. \nCardio: 15-20 minutes of jogging at a medium pace

Crunches:							3sets		12-15 reps
Barbell Bench Press:		3sets		8-12 reps
Back Extensions:			3 sets		12-15 reps
Squats:								3 sets		15 reps
Standing Calf Raises:	3 sets		15 reps
Pull-ups:							3 sets		5-10 reps
Bicycle crunches:			3 sets		8-12 reps

Cool down cardio: speed walking or slow jogging for 5 minutes
